about_the_game:
Originally released in December 1996, this classic has stood the test of time. Set amidst the icy waters of the Norwegian Sea, you stand vigilant, guarding the coastline as you meticulously plan a large-scale naval assault against your foes. Suddenly, your sensors detect a hidden submarine 60° to port and an enemy fleet 92° to starboard. With the belief that offense is the best defense, you make the bold decision to strike first. Armed with a vast arsenal of over 100 high-powered weapons, you embark on a mission to annihilate everything that stands in your path to total domination of the seas.

Building on the legacy of the original Harpoon®, one of the most sophisticated and realistic modern naval war games ever created, Harpoon Classic 97 delivers a timeless gaming experience: Engage in strategic, contemporary naval warfare with 50 new missions. Featuring new displays, updated scenarios, and a more intuitive interface, Harpoon Classic 97 is set to challenge and enhance your tactical expertise. 

Key Features:

  • Redesigned control interface and an introductory quick start mode make Harpoon Classic 97 easy to pick up and accessible to all players.

  • 50 new missions, bringing the total to over 250 scenarios.

  • Command ships, submarines, and aircraft across four theaters of war: Greenland & Iceland, North Atlantic, Indian Ocean & Persian Gulf, and the Mediterranean.

  • Enhanced artwork and terrain graphics for an immersive experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 2060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
